text: @CCWilmers @IvelRev @Feargal_Sharkey @RussellB1ggs @NorthHertsDC @OliverHealdUK @EnvAgency @AffinityWater @stevekjarvis I've just come back from there. It looks awful but I spoke to the technician from Anglian Water and he assured me that none of the sewage was going into the Ivel. In fact, you can see it going into the ground where it is filtering its way into the groundwater. No solids btw.
